code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words, mild difficulty in school, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat x 2 weeks. pt also reports chronic mild difficulty with reading and writing. he is a 58 YO white male gold smith. he drinks alcohol heavily for the past 2 years he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 188 cm, Weight 53.4 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

content2.Unmatched: pt also reports chronic mild difficulty

td.content: s:patient complains of mild difficulty in school, mild difficulty with reading and writing and mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words and other medical problems. NKDA. patient is a 59 yr old male gold smith. he is a chronic alcoholic he denies smoking o:Height 188 cm, Weight 53.7 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.
